info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 08 at 4:18PM CST until January 08 at 4:45PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Fort Bend County in southeastern Texas... Central Harris County in southeastern Texas... * Until 445 PM CST. * At 418 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over southern Addicks Park Ten, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Northeastern Sugar Land, Bellaire, Humble, West University Place, Galena Park, Jacinto City, Jersey Village, Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Midtown Houston, Downtown Houston, Northside / Northline, Greenway / Upper Kirby Area, Spring Branch North, Second Ward, Greater Greenspoint, Greater Heights, Mission Bend, and Neartown / Montrose. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for southeastern Texas.
